channel.title: psc on Blah, Cloud
channel.description: Recent content in psc on Blah, Cloud

item.title: Migrating from VCSA embedded PSC to external PSC
item.description: On a bit of a shorter note to my previous article/novella â†— - I have been moving my lab to a bit more of an “enterprise” style architecture - deploying SRM was in the way for that, so I had the need to set up another vCenter, however this gave the opportunity to move to a multi-PSC, multi-VC architecture. There is quite some complexity in my lab with regard to vCenter and its integrations, I have running in production vRO, NSX and vCD - it’s also plugged into VIO and VR, so naturally I really don’t want to reinstall all these components and reconfigure them as a lot of work has gone in, in particular with NSX, dynamic peering etc set up with upstream routers and its integration with vCD.
